alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Santa Clarita Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 01 at 7:07AM PST until January 01 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 50 mph are expected, strongest in the mountains above the Highway 14 corridor. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley and Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...Until 2 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Major roadways impacted by the strong winds include interstate 5 and highway 14.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Santa Clarita Valley
